Articles.Content: I've beaten down Gopheria some, but they'll rebuild soon. Seahorse has already rebuilt and far outnumbers me, 2 to 1. If they don't agree to peace, I'll see how long I can weather this.
Seahorse has accepted my peace offer, at a price. I'll be regenerating money for a while. Peace with the rest of the Corn Shuckers may hopefully follow.

Well I was taken out of the war over night by one of there member.I have been reduced from a a partly industrialized country to a Agricultural country.I guess I need to build an army next time when i get back on my feet.
I'm sending you $40,000 MGUARN.

Until the crisis is over I'll be regularly putting food on the Alliance trade, for any nation that desperately needs it. Roughly 100 units per day.

And... you can send money? How? I haven't seen that option anywhere.

No. You'll have to think smart. This isn't >BLOC, you know!

Nations in the warring alliances, or just ANY nation?

Nations of warring alliances. Anyway, it looks like that's no longer necessary.

EDIT: I think some people are warring because they want to see how the ability to win war works. I'll test it personally.

Edited April 12, 2014 by Designer225

Indeed, I've tested it many times now and you get a crap ton of money plus the defender's resources. I got $500,000 from one victory against a high-level inactive nation.

You send money by offering to buy something from the other nation. Buying 1 food and putting whatever amount you want to send as the PPU is great for this.

well im getting back to my feet after several wars under the Mechanical Cause brought great benefits to have my nation back on it's feet ,and not to mention im now digging up uranium.Still I need to start making another farm cause im losing 11 food per day.So far everything on the home front is going well.
I got a temporary steel mill running now. Will anyone still be needing it or has the dust begun to settle now?
People still need money for recovery.

well I believe the war has ended ,but the road to recovery has begun.Finally I am now producing foods again ,but im still long ways to going back to normal.Need to rebuild my steel mill ,and recycling center as well buy more land as I sold most of it to speed build barracks ,and rebuild infrastructure.

would you like me to supply food? i have over 600 remaining and I can start producing more, plus I put another 500 or so on the alliance market. steel rakes in tons of cash, if we are all going to build up to similar levels of national score. this will be good for us, since we can back each other up more readily in wartime, personally speaking.

Please, for the love of god stop blowing up my stuff.

Also, how would you feel about adopting a client state? I'm seriously considering this and i think i would make a great protectorate! so, thoughts?

also, screw you and your massive armies. And, especially screw you with your backstabbing belligerent actions!

This is that alliance I angered: http://politicsandwar.com/alliance/id=202

They don't have a large standing army, so I may be fine, unless they get more people in on it.

Wow reading the message seems pretty funny.Though you better start working on making your economy strong ,and tough so that you can weather through .Plus there alliance is fairly small unless they got some sort of deal with other alliances to turn our alliance into a pile of smoldering scrap.Work with caution ,and build up.
